entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and drizzle ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
